name: Catacombs (itch) (KixZena)
description:
Story :

A little boy wakes up by a magic incantation in a hostile place.

With the help of a little ghost, he tries to find the exit of the catacombs.

By collecting luminous orbs, he will have to defend himself against monsters and light his way to discover a strange world ! 

Game :

Catacombs is an adventure prototype game and the goal is to find an exit. 

  • Metroidvania
  • Solo
  • PC
